description.value:
You command the attention of all around you with style, ensuring their gaze falls only upon you until the end of your next turn. Whenever a creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] around you attempts a saving throw against a different visual effect, it gets a result one degree of success better than it rolled. This is a fortune effect.

When an enemy within the aura attempts to use a visual effect that involves focusing its attention on a particular creature (such as a medusa's Focus Gaze), it must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher, in order to target any creature except you.

Allies in the aura can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Hide] even if they don't have cover, as you are continually providing a distraction.
